channel.title: Runtime Error :(
channel.description:
[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 006537F5 in module 'scar.exe'. Read of address 00000000 in line 9 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\Test\FontTest2.scar
A restart didnt fix it Running as admin didnt fix it Trying divi and 2.03 didnt fix it
The script this is is from is the standard FontTest2 in the scripts/test/ directory
Anyone know whats going wrong?

item.title: Runtime Error :(
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

mother fucker i hate vista, it worked like a couple of days ago and now tis giving me grief again.

Read full topic

item.title: Runtime Error :(
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Actually yeah, a bad pointer will happen when the function fails for any reason, not just the font not existing.

Most likely you just found another Scar<->Vista incompatibility.

Read full topic

item.title: Runtime Error :(
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

That’s very odd, it works fine for me.

The only thing I could possibly think of is if the font dosen’t exist, but surely it’s almost impossible not to have that font?

Read full topic
